Name: Sky Centipede
Description: Bearers of fickle winds, Sky Centipedes are blown about by the currents of pneuma that come with great misfortune and disastrous storms. Their segmented insectoid bodies are held aloft by a thousand and one wings, each flap stirring up ill omen and misfortune as they scurry through the air.
Mechanics: The X inflicts Misfortune with some of its actions. The current card will list a number of action types that are Ill Omens, when a character performs an action of that type, that character clears all Misfortune and takes 6 Typeless damage per Misfortune cleared. One instance of Misfortune can be cleared as an action.
BasicAction:
If not adjacent to a target, move to the nearest target. Uses **Jaws That Catch** twice. Uses **Tail Whip** with remaining actions.
**Step:** 4 Squares
**Stride:** 10 Squares
**Jaws That Catch:** Melee. 16 Typeless, On-Hit: Misfortune
**Tail Whip:** The Sky Centipede’s tail rotates halfway around its head. All characters the tail moves adjacent to during this rotation are targeted by this Strike. Melee. 24 Bash.
Size: 1x4, one end square is a designated Head
AttackCards:
Ill Winds Blow | *Ill Omen: Boost, Utility.*
Instinct becomes: If not adjacent, move to the nearest target. Uses **Fickle Winds** with remaining actions, prioritizing hitting as many targets as possible.
***Fickle Winds:*** *Melee. Normal 6 Cone. 18 Hollow, On-Hit: Misfortune.*

Unrelenting Unluck | *Ill Omen: Utility, Defend.*
**Tail Whip** gains Agile and rotates the entire way around the Sky Centipede’s head (effectively becoming a Starburst 3 centered on the head). Instinct becomes: If not adjacent, move to be within 3 squares of as many targets as possible. Uses **Tail Whip** with remaining actions.

Whirlwind | *Ill Omen: Boost, Movement (Grimoire-granted Movement actions, not Stride and Step).*
Inflict Knockback 5 towards the Sky Centipede on all characters. Characters who end this Knockback adjacent to the Sky Centipede take 16 Typeless and Misfortune.

Fickle Gale | *Ill Omen: Boost, Utility.*
Melee. Wide 8 Cone. 12 Bash and Knockback 6.

Wanton Misfortune | *Ill Omen: Strike.*
Inflict one Misfortune on all characters.
